Serialized Fields

pathField

javax.swing.JTextField pathField
The JTextField with the database path. Which is a file location or a machine location (url).

changePathButton

javax.swing.JButton changePathButton
The change path button allows the user to choose a different database path file or a machine mapped in the client machine network.

portField

javax.swing.JFormattedTextField portField
The port number text field which only allows numbers to be filled.

options

ConfigOptions options
The reference to the object which will be updated with the user choices.
